Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.Server

Class Lobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.Server.Lobby
  • public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Lobby implements a simple lobby for the server.
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    Vadym Nahrudnyy

      • checkReady

        private void checkReady()

      • addPlayerToLobby

        protected void addPlayerToLobby​(int desiredNumPlayers,
                                VirtualView client,
                                java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.Thread viewThread)
        Check the username of the player and insert it in the lobby. In case the username is already present, the insertion is aborted and an error message is sent to the player. Once a insertion is made successfully, if a game is ready to start, the method starts it in a new thread.
        Parameters:
        desiredNumPlayers - Number of players in the game wanted by the player.
        client - VirtualView of the player.
        username - username of the player.
        viewThread - Thread the player's virtual view is running on.
        Since:
        version 2.1

      • startGame

        private void startGame()
        Start a game when a lobby is full. When a lobby is full it creates a new instance of GameController and run it in a new Thread and resets the lobby.
        Since:
        version 2.2

      • removePlayerFromLobby

        protected void removePlayerFromLobby​(VirtualView client,
                                     java.lang.String username)
        Delete a player from a lobby. It checks the lobby the player is in and then removes it from the lobby using the corresponding method.
        Parameters:
        client - Virtual view of the player to remove.
        username - Username of the player to remove.
        Since:
        version 2.1
